LanguageData.Nudist.degreeDatas.0.label: nudist
LanguageData.Nudist.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME enjoys the feeling of freedom that comes from being nude. HECAP can handle clothing, but will be happier without it.
LanguageData.Bloodlust.degreeDatas.0.label: bloodlust
LanguageData.Bloodlust.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME gets a rush from hurting people, and never minds the sight of blood or death. HECAP is twice as likely to start a social fight.
LanguageData.Psychopath.degreeDatas.0.label: psychopath
LanguageData.Psychopath.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME has no empathy. The suffering of others doesn't bother HIM at all. HECAP doesn't mind if others are butchered, left unburied, imprisoned, or sold to slavery - unless it affects HIM. HECAP also feels no mood boost from socializing.
LanguageData.Cannibal.degreeDatas.0.label: cannibal
LanguageData.Cannibal.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME was taught that eating human meat is wrong and horrible. But one time, long ago, HE tried it... and HE liked it.
LanguageData.Abrasive.degreeDatas.0.label: abrasive
LanguageData.Abrasive.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME always says exactly what's on HIS mind, especially if it's bugging HIM. That tends to rub people the wrong way.
LanguageData.TooSmart.degreeDatas.0.label: too smart
LanguageData.TooSmart.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME is too smart for HIS own good. HECAP learns everything much faster than everyone, but can be quite eccentric.
LanguageData.Brawler.degreeDatas.0.label: brawler
LanguageData.Brawler.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME likes to fight up close and personal. HISCAP accuracy is greatly increased in melee combat, but HE'll be very unhappy if asked to carry a ranged weapon.
LanguageData.Masochist.degreeDatas.0.label: masochist
LanguageData.Masochist.degreeDatas.0.description: For NAME, there's something exciting about getting hurt. HECAP doesn't know why, HE's just wired differently.
LanguageData.Prosthophile.degreeDatas.0.label: Prosthophile
LanguageData.Prosthophile.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME feels limited in HIS feeble human body. HECAP often dreams of going bionic.
LanguageData.Prosthophobe.degreeDatas.0.label: Prosthophobe
LanguageData.Prosthophobe.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME believes the human body is limited for a reason. To HIM, bionic body parts are unethical.
LanguageData.GreenThumb.degreeDatas.0.label: green thumb
LanguageData.GreenThumb.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME has a passion for gardening. HECAP gets a mood bonus for every plant HE sows.
LanguageData.NightOwl.degreeDatas.0.label: night owl
LanguageData.NightOwl.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME likes to work at night. HECAP gets a mood bonus if awake at night and mood loss if awake during the day.
LanguageData.Greedy.degreeDatas.0.label: greedy
LanguageData.Greedy.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME needs a really impressive bedroom. HECAP gets a mood loss if HE doesn't get what HE wants.
LanguageData.Jealous.degreeDatas.0.label: jealous
LanguageData.Jealous.degreeDatas.0.description: For NAME, it's degrading to have a less impressive bedroom than someone else. HECAP gets a mood loss if any colonist has a more impressive bedroom.
LanguageData.Ascetic.degreeDatas.0.label: ascetic
LanguageData.Ascetic.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME prefers to live in asceticism. HECAP gets a mood loss if HE has a bedroom that's too impressive.
LanguageData.Gay.degreeDatas.0.label: gay
LanguageData.Gay.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME is romantically attracted to people of HIS own gender.
LanguageData.DislikesMen.degreeDatas.0.label: dislikes men
LanguageData.DislikesMen.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME really dislikes and distrusts men.
LanguageData.DislikesWomen.degreeDatas.0.label: dislikes women
LanguageData.DislikesWomen.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME really dislikes and distrusts women.
